items.content: Provide value comparison, highlight long-term savings, and explain product quality.
Encourage setting up a follow-up meeting and offer additional resources to assist in the decision.
Customers have 30 days to return products in original condition with a receipt.
Employees are expected to maintain regular attendance and inform their supervisors in advance for planned absences.

items.header: How do I reset my password?
items.content: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions.

items.header: How do I access the company portal?
items.content: Use your employee credentials to log in at portal.company.com.
The Employee Handbook outlines company policies, procedures, and benefits. Refer to section 3 for HR policies.
Employees must sign the NDA before accessing sensitive company information.
Access the company directory to find contact information for all departments.
Submit a support ticket or contact IT at support@company.com for technical assistance.
